column4: BRIEF-Connecticut Retirement Plans & Trust Funds seek shareholders' nod for declassification of Tesla board
column5: * Connecticut Retirement Plans and Trust Funds urges Tesla Inc shareholders to vote for proposal related to board declassification at Tesla - SEC filing

column4: Worker advocacy group report says Tesla's injury rate higher than average
column5: SAN FRANCISCO A California-based workers advocacy group released a report on Wednesday saying that Tesla Inc data showed its workers have been injured at a rate a third higher than the auto industry average.

column4: Worker advocacy group report says Tesla's injury rate higher than average
column5: SAN FRANCISCO  May 24 A California-based workers advocacy group released a report on Wednesday saying that Tesla Inc data showed its workers have been injured at a rate a third higher than the auto industry average.
